scripts.deploy: npm run build:dev && az storage blob upload-batch --destination '$web' --source ./dist --account-name staifrontspa001 --auth-mode login --overwrite
scripts.clean: node -e "const fs = require('fs'); ['dist', 'node_modules/.vite'].forEach(dir => { try { fs.rmSync(dir, {recursive: true, force: true}); console.log('Cleaned', dir); } catch (e) { console.log(dir, 'not found or already clean'); } });"
